EmailTemplate.description: EM-2017-08-04-VMworld ENT East Contacat Email Send
EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-08-04-VMWorld Ent East Send.EM-2017-08-04-VMworld ENT East Contacat Emai
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic Leadership at VMworld
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Friend}},
I’d like to invite you to meet with our leadership team at VMworld in Las Vegas for an exclusive opportunity to get a 30-minute on-site briefing on Turbonomic’s Hybrid Cloud Management. During this briefing you will have the opportunity to:
- Network with technology thought leaders including our Executive Chairman and former HPE COO Bill Veghte, and our Founder and former SMARTS CTO Shmuel Kliger.
- Gain VIP insight into Turbonomic’s roadmap
- Learn about our 5.9 Release, - featuring capabilities that are enabling our customers to minimize costs, assure performance and enforce compliance across all clouds from VMware to Amazon Web Services and Microsoft Azure.
I would be delighted to schedule you with any of the following executives at VMworld. Simply let me know by requesting a meeting here <[[https://turbonomic.com/leadership-meetings]]>
Turbonomic Executives at VMworld US (August 27th – 31st, 2017)
- Ben Nye <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/external-link.jspa?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fin%2Fbenjaminnye%2F]]>, Chief Executive Officer
- Charles Crouchman <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/external-link.jspa?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fin%2Fcharles-crouchman-23250b%2F]]>, Chief Technology Officer
- Alex Hesterberg <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/external-link.jspa?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fin%2Falex-hesterberg-7b23014%2F]]>, Chief Customer Officer
- Jennifer Heard <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/external-link.jspa?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fin%2Fjenniferheard%2F]]>, SVP Global Strategic Partners
- Shmuel Kliger <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/external-link.jspa?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fin%2Fshmuel-kliger-1a91963%2F]]>, Founder and President
Yours sincerely,
Your friends at Turbonomic
